welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kucukcekmece, a charming city in Turkey known for its beautiful lakeside views and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, expected to open in 2021 and serve as the home base for Turkish Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'IST Wi-Fi' network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Sabiha Gokcen Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration process.
